vote.title: Appointment of Member to the School Construction Bond Citizens’ Oversight Committee (Hamner) (Sup Res 005-21/22)
vote.description: Resolved, That the Governing Board of the Los Angeles Unified School District ratifies the nomination of Mr. Michael Hamner, representing the American Institute of Architects, as Member to the School Construction Bond Citizens’ Oversight Committee for a two-year term commencing immediately.  Mr. Hamner is not an employee, official, vendor, contractor, or consultant of the District.
